website_summaries.verdict: Garden Warfare 2 fleshes out the team-based shooting antics of the original with new characters, fresh game modes, and a richer single-player experience.
pros: Wacky, cartoonish shooting fun with plenty of nuanced mechanics
Extensive single-player content to complement the online play
cons: Asymmetrical balance means some characters outshine others
Latency issues can crop up, resulting in stutter matches and missed shots

customer_reviews.title: It is far harder than the first but definitely more fun. Popcap are extremely responsive to customer queries like ...
customer_reviews.text: Plants Vs Zombies: Garden Warfare 2 is the game to play. It's a huge upgrade from the first in the series, with extended maps, more content, new characters with the addition of quests to keep you occupied. It is far harder than the first but definitely more fun. Popcap are extremely responsive to customer queries like certain classes being too OP, and they have already announced that they will be changing it to make classes more balanced. Great plus in my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you buy this. Despite my kids laptop meeting all the specs it would not work. My ASUS laptop has x2 graphics cards, the dedicated Nvidea one that can handle anything and an intel HD4000 card. The game keeps on switching to the intel card that crashes it and until I work out how to update it , (I am having several issues here), than the game will not work. Can't disable it neither. If I had just the Nvidea card I would be fine. Check your system before buying and look at the internet threads to see just how many people are having similar problems.

product_meta.title: Plants vs Zombies: Garden Warfare 2 (PC DVD)
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:StandardThe battle for suburbia grows to crazy new heights in Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2! For the first time in franchise history, zombies have taken over and plants are on the attack. With new characters, more ways to play and immersive new maps, Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 taps into the heart of what fans loved about the original and goes above and beyond to deliver the funniest, craziest, and most over-the-top shooter.

BOX CONTAINS
Game Disc
feature_bullets: Plants Attack — Bring the fight to the zombies for the first time in franchise history. Go on the offensive as the plants in all-new 24-player Herbal Assault mode, or defend Zomburbia in 4-player zombie co-op in Graveyard Ops.

Characters From All Ages — Bring even more strategic depth to this all-out botanical battle with 14 total character classes, and over 100 playable plants and zombies from the past, present, and future.

Play Your Way — With over 7 lawn-inspiring game modes, play in crazy 24-player online battles in Herbal Assault or Gardens & Graveyards, choose the plant or zombie side in 4-player co-op, or go solo playing against AI opponents or locally in split-screen co-op across any mode in the game (no Xbox Live Gold or PS Plus required).

A Living PvZ World — The struggle for Suburbia has come into full bloom, with 12 maps bursting with personality and humor, Zombossified cityscapes, and crowded airspaces, all layered with hidden secrets waiting to be discovered.
